text: Rolf Hoppe (6 December 1930 - 14 November 2018) was a German movie and stage actor.Frühlingslieder auf Frühlingslieder.com (abgerufen am 19. Juni 2010) He was born in Ellrich, Germany. Hoppe was known for his roles in I Was Nineteen, Three Wishes for Cinderella, Mephisto, The Harmonists, and in Palmetto. Hoppe died on 14 November 2018 in Dresden, Germany at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:2018 deaths Category:German movie actors Category:German stage actors Category:People from Thuringia
title: Rolf Hoppe
